name: Set! Delta Accel! (v1)
text:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "T.G. Halberd Cannon", "T.G. Blade Blaster", "T.G. Power Gladiator", "T.G. Wonder Magician", and "T.G. Recipro Dragonfly" to your Extra Deck.
In addition, you can use this effect during the turn you have Synchro Summoned 2 or more "T.G." Synchro Monsters. Play 1 "T.G. Recipro Dragonfly" from your Extra Deck.
This Skill can only be used once per turn.
